name: narthex
description: You stand in the narthex. You can walk _northeast_, _northwest_, _southeast_, _southwest_, _west_, _east_, _north_, or _south_. You can just stand in the _center_.

commands.name: northeast
commands.description: You're !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !SECTION_ATMOSPHERE to the northeast section of the !ROOM_NAME.

commands.name: northwest
commands.description: You're !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !SECTION_ATMOSPHERE to the northwest section of the !ROOM_NAME.

commands.name: southeast
commands.description: You're !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !SECTION_ATMOSPHERE to the southeast section of the !ROOM_NAME.

commands.name: southwest
commands.description: You're !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !SECTION_ATMOSPHERE to the southwest section of the !ROOM_NAME.

commands.name: north
commands.description: You're !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !SECTION_ATMOSPHERE to the north section of the !ROOM_NAME.

commands.name: south
commands.description: You're !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !SECTION_ATMOSPHERE to the south section of the !ROOM_NAME.

commands.name: east
commands.description: You're !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !SECTION_ATMOSPHERE to the east section of the !ROOM_NAME.

commands.name: west
commands.description: You're !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !SECTION_ATMOSPHERE to the west section of the !ROOM_NAME.

commands.name: center
commands.description: You're !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !SECTION_ATMOSPHERE to the center section of the !ROOM_NAME.
